name: Werewolf
armor_desc: n humanoid form, 12 (natural armor) in wolf or hybrid for
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The werewolf makes three Claws or Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack, provided it is in the appropriate form.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d8+2) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be cursed with the werewolf lycanthropy curse (see Curse of Lycanthropy sidebar).

actions.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The werewolf's Perception is 17 while perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The werewolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the werewolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
